Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.scheduling.tasks

Interface Summary
ScheduledTask A Cyclos scheduled task.
 

Class Summary
AccountFeeScheduledTask Runs the account fees
AdExpirationScheduledTask Scheduled task that notifies expired ads
BaseScheduledTask Base implementation for a scheduled task
BrokerCommissionContractActivationScheduledTask Scheduled task that activates accepted broker commission contracts that begin today
BrokerCommissionContractExpirationScheduledTask Scheduled task that expires broker commission contracts
BrokeringCommissionStatusExpirationScheduledTask Scheduled task that expires brokering commission status
BrokeringExpirationScheduledTask Task used to process expired brokerings
CardScheduledTask  
CertificationScheduledTask Task that changes the certification's status
CloseBalancesScheduledTask A scheduled task which closes the balances for all accounts
GuaranteeLoanScheduledTask Task that generates the guarantee's loan
GuaranteeScheduledTask Task that changes the guarantee's status
InvoiceAlertScheduledTask Scheduled task used to alert expired system invoices
InvoiceExpirationScheduledTask Scheduled task used to expire invoices with expired scheduled payments
LoanExpirationScheduledTask Task that expires loans
MemberGroupRegistrationExpirationScheduledTask Scheduled task that expires member registrations on groups that expires after a given time period
PaymentObligationScheduledTask Task that changes the payment obligation's status
PaymentProcessingScheduledTask Scheduled task used to process scheduled payments
PurgeAccessTracesScheduledTask A scheduled task which purges old traces for credentials and permission denied exceptions
PurgeExpiredSessionsScheduledTask A scheduled task which purges expired sessions
PurgeOldImportsScheduledTask Scheduled task used to remove old member and advertisement imports
PurgeOldIndexOperationsScheduledTask An scheduled task which purges old index operations
PurgeOldMailValidationsScheduledTask Scheduled task used to purge old pending public registrations (whose member haven't activated them after some time)
PurgeOldMessagesOnTrashScheduledTask Scheduled task used to purge messages removed after a given time period
PurgeOldTraceNumbersScheduledTask  
TicketExpirationScheduledTask Scheduled task that expires tickets
TransactionFeedackExpirationScheduledTask Scheduled task that generates default transaction feedbacks after the expiration
